parameters.name: AclIds
parameters.description: The ID of the network ACL. You can specify up to 20 network ACL IDs in each request.

parameters.name: AclName
parameters.description:
The name of the network ACL. You can specify up to 10 network ACL names in each request.

The name must be 2 to 128 characters in length, and can contain digits, periods (.), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-). The name must start with a letter.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate the value, but you must make sure that it is unique among different requests. The client token can contain only ASCII characters.

>  If you do not set this parameter, **ClientToken** is set to the value of **RequestId**. The value of **RequestId** for each API request may be different.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **1** to **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The token that is used for the next query. Valid values:

*   If this is your first and only query, ignore this parameter.
*   If a subsequent query is to be performed, set the parameter to the value of NextToken that is returned from the last call.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the Global Accelerator (GA) instance is deployed. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.
